QuestData.Title: Stocking Up
QuestData.Description: Hello hello! The Scourge to the south are digging up some ancient dragon thing. I could care less why they're doing it, but they're pulling cartloads of composite ore in the process.$b$bGo lift me a bunch of that ore. That stuff should yield a pretty penny for all the weapons the Horde are crafting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 8 bundles of Composite Ore from the digs surrounding Galakrond's Rest and bring them to Xink at Nozzlerust Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get the ore? My carrier will be back shortly - we need to get this shipment out while the fight's still going!
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! That's quite a load! Your back feeling alright?
